Dipinang Bayern Munchen, Erik ten Hag: Saya Masih Betah di Ajax
05 Nov 2019, 00:25 by Terjemahan, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Pelatih Ajax Amsterdam, Erik ten Hag, langsung merespons ihwal pinangan dari klub Jerman, Bayern Munchen. Pelatih yang sukses membawa Ajax ke semfinal Liga Champions musim lalu ini mengatakan akan tetap berada di Amsterdam.
"Saya merasakan hubungan yang kuat dengan tim, dengan semua orang di Ajax. Saya pastikan akan tetap di Ajax pada musim ini," kata Erik jelang laga melawan Chelsea, Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Pelatih berusia 49 tahun ini tak menutupi bila Bayern Munchen masih ada di hatinya. Namun ia harus realistis karena saat ini Ajax menunjuknya menjadi pelatih. "Bayern klub yang fantastik. Saya bukan pemimpi. Saat ini saya ada di Ajax dan akan fokus dan tinggal di sini," sebut dia.
Bayern Munchen bukan klub asing bagi Erik. Ia pernah dipercaya melatih tim cadangan atau Bayern II pada periode 2013-2015 sebelum hijarah ke Liga Belanda. Bersama Ajax, ia sukses meraih juara Liga Utama atau Eredivisie dan Piala Liga Belanda. Berdasarkan kontrak, Erik akan berada di Ajax hingga 2022.
Sebelumnya, Bayern Munchen resmi memutus hubungan kerja dengan Niko Kovac. Ia dipecat usai Bayern dibantai 1-5 oleh Eintracht Frankfurt di kompetisi Liga Jerman atau Bundesliga. Juara Bundesliga ini disebut-sebut tertarik memulangkan Erik.

With Bayern Munich, Erik ten Hag: I am still good at Ajax
05 Nov 2019, 00:25 by Translation, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Ajax Amsterdam coach Erik ten Hag immediately responded to the proposal from the German club, Bayern Munich. The coach who successfully brought Ajax to the Champions League semifinals last season said he would remain in Amsterdam.
"I feel a strong connection with the team, with everyone at Ajax. I am sure I will stay at Ajax this season," Erik said ahead of the game against Chelsea on Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
The 49-year-old coach does not cover if Bayern Munich is still in his heart. But he must be realistic because now Ajax appointed him to be a coach. "Bayern is a fantastic club. I am not a dreamer. At the moment I am at Ajax and will focus and stay here," he said.
Bayern Munich is not a foreign club for Erik. He was once trusted to coach the reserve team or Bayern II in the 2013-2015 period before going to the Dutch League. Together with Ajax, he successfully won the Premier League or Eredivisie and the Dutch League Cup. Based on the contract, Erik will be at Ajax until 2022.
Previously, Bayern Munich officially cut off working relations with Niko Kovac. He was fired after Bayern were slaughtered 1-5 by Eintracht Frankfurt in the German League or Bundesliga competition. The Bundesliga champion is said to be interested in sending Erik home.
